transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello. Haan ji.
Customer: Hello. Yes, good evening sir. Shalaka from IndiaMART. Kaise ho?
Customer: Badhiya.
Executive: Awaaz aa rahi hai?
Customer: Ji aa rahi hai.
Executive: So rahe ho kya?
Customer: Nahi actually aaj off tha to mera doctor se isme a to main waiting kar rahi hu. Isliye jaise aapka call receive kar payi shuru.
Executive: Kuch hamare kuch marketing wale hain jo dekhte hain unko kuch iski basic jankari chahiye jo aap aap bada package bata rahe the.
Customer: A kya
Executive: Wo aap inse baat kar lo yaar.
Customer: Achcha theek hai.
Executive: Hello. Haan ji.
Executive: Ji mam good evening mam.
Customer: Good evening sir.
Executive: Main ye puchna chah raha tha ki jaise mam abhi
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Abhi jo apna jo ek tarah se package chal raha hai. To uska kya hai matlab kis type se kya hai wo. Abhi jo package chal raha hai usme kis type se aap kitni leads dete ho daily ki jaise aapka usme teen leads aati hai aur sunday ko kuch jyada aati hai. Ye hai.
Customer: Okay. Sir actually abhi main system pe nahi hu to aap ek baar mujhe bata sakte ho the ki package ka naam kya hai? I think TrustSeal hai.
Executive: Star package star package ki main baat kar raha hu. Ji star package ke bare me aap bata dijiye uska to jaise man lo mere ko pata hai. Star package me hame kya kya matlab customer read kya rahegi apni pura uska pura ek baar thoda sa mere ko bataiye aap.
Customer: Theek hai. Sir dekho agar star ki baat karte hain to star me na thoda sa hamara city ke according chala jata hai city or category ke according. To basically kya hota hai aapke products me jo bhi categories add hongi. Theek hai jo bhi aapka main category aapko promote karwana hai ya fir aapka jo bhi priority product hota hai uski category aapko promote karani hai. To uske basis pe hum aapki top listing dikhate hain un particular cities me jisme aap deal kar rahe ho. Jiske basically aap by list vajah consume karoge usme aapka pattern develop hoga aur unhi cities me aapke jo bhi category me aap karoge star karwaoge sir us particular category me aapka top pe show hoga. Top in the sense first page pe hi on the first first company. Theek hai? First second company me hi rotate karta hai agar aapke ha.
Executive: Ji boliye. Isme jaise aapne city wise bataya ek to ki city wise aap category target karoge. Jo hum category batayenge aapko wo city wise uske upar target karoge. To mam jaise ki abhi man lo aapne yaha pe ek tarah se isme de rakha hai ki daily ke two leads ka ek ye aur beech me aapne kuch kuch aur de rakha hai to to us type se kya kya matlab usme kya rahega labh ji.
Customer: Sir main genuinely batau aapko to aap mujhe thoda sa time dijiye main system pe baith ke shayad aapko thoda detail me bata paungi aur agar abhi thoda urgent hai to aap mujhe do minute dijiye main call back karwati hu apne senior se kyuki main abhi doctor clinic me baithi thi to main kuch bhi review nahi karwa paungi sir. Theek hai main call back arrange karwati hu.
Executive: Okay okay okay.
Customer: Okay okay sir. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants details of the star package.

- Wants to know the benefits of the package.



Resolution:

- Explained star package is city and category based.

- Offered to arrange a call back from senior.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will arrange a call back.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- package, star package, leads, category
